DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Ethiopian honey slowly/rapidly raise blood glucose level .
DOC.detailed_description: Addis Ababa University , College Natural Sciences , Research Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approve study . Written consent form obtain 14 volunteer ( 7 female 7 male ) . The subject randomly recruit twenty eight 3rd year Food Science Postharvest Technology student . People volunteer participate study exclude : overweight , diet , smoking , family history diabetes , pregnant , metabolic disorder , suffer illness food allergy regularly take medication . The participant check glucose tolerance accord WHO ( World Health Organization ) classification ( fast glucose < 7 mmol/L ( millimole per lite ) 2-hour blood glucose concentration 25g glucose load < 7.8 mmol/L ) . Ten ( 5 female 5 male ) select fourteen use lottery sample method . Reference glucose monofloral honey use experimental food . To determine GI value , 25 gram available carbohydrate feed ten healthy people morning fast 11 hour overnight . After fast blood sample obtain . The study participant consume honey reference glucose serve . Additional blood sample take 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 , 90 120 minute eat commence . Blood glucose response ( Area curve , AUCt ) test food compare blood glucose response reference glucose ( AUCr ) . AUC calculate use SAS ( Statistical Analysis Software ) , 2002 . Glycemic index ( GI ) calculate use : GI= AUCt/AUCr*100 Where : AUCt = Area Under Curve honey ; AUCr = Area Under Curve reference glucose
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis diabetes Disease Must able drink honey reference glucose Overweight , dieting , smoking , family history diabetes , pregnant , metabolic disorder , suffer illness food allergy regularly take medication .
